entry.title: Archive Post 7: Publications related to Offerings

link.title: Archive Post 7: Publications related to Offerings

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share Publications related to Offerings that have been received or scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

PO1.

1974-0321 Reading of ‘Parama Pūjya Baghavatī Nirmalā Devī Māhātmya’ by Madhukar Thakur at Public Program, Biralā Krīṛā Keṃdra, Chowpatty, Girgaum Chowpatty, Mumbai, MH, India (likely 1975 Compilation) (Balwant Kumbhojkar Collection) (32 slides or 18 pages, uploaded on 2023-0519), Jpgs Variant cropped by CCT from the pdf file: Publications-Offerings
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, This post will share Publications related to Offerings that have been received or scanned by the team. Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces). Jay Śhrī Mātājī! entry.title: Archive Post 6: Articles
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share newspaper articles received or scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

A1.

1990-0606 and 0607 Articles (Chinese) in ‘World Journal’, 141-07 20th Avenue, Whitestone, NY, U.S.A. (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A2.

1990-0800 Newspaper Photos with Caption published in Studenstké Listy, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0518), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A3.

1993-0724 Article ‘7. čakra pro každého’ (7th chakra for everyone) by Viktor Šlajchrt in section Kultura, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A4.

1993-0726 Article ‘Indická bohyne v Praze’ (Indian goddess in Prague) by Jana Blažková, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0601), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A5.

1993-0726 Article ‘Indka milu české lidi’ (Indian lady loves Czech people) by František Lauer published in the daily newspaper Blesk (Year 2, Number 170), Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A6.

1993-0726 Article ‘Léčila me bohyne’ (I was healed by a goddess), Pargue, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0531), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A7.

1994-0900 Article ‘Zujme si boty - Matka přichází’ (Take off your shoes - Mother is coming) by Věra Mosková on the 0904 Public Program, published in the daily newspaper Blesk, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0531), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A8.

1995-0800 Article ‘Matka Nirmala Devi přijíždí do Prahy Jóga radosti a poznání’ (Mother Nirmala Devi arrives in Prague Yoga of joy and knowledge), Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0518), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A9.

1995-0807 Article about the Arrival on 0806 with Photo, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0601), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A10.

1996-0717 Article ‘Prisli Jsme si pro Kousek lásky kterou rozdávála Šri Mátadží’ by Eva Sýkorová published in Večernik Praha, Czech Republic, (David Burša Collection) (2 pages, uploaded on 2023-0508), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A11.

2001-1228 Article (Marathi) in Ratnagiri Times, Front Page, Maharashtra, India (Balwant Kumbhojkar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A12.

2003-1200 Article ‘शिव और शक्ति का वास्तविक मिलान’ (Real Union of Shiva and Shakti) (Hindi), published in Shri Mahashakti Sagar, 4th year, issue 10 (Balwant Kumbhojkar Collection) (2 pages, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A13.

2012-0319 A Tribute ‘Sahaja Yoga for Stress Free Life and Good Health’, Free Press Journal, Page 18, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 pages, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A14.

2012-0703 A Tribute to Shri Mataji Nirmala Devi on Guru Purnima, Free Press Journal, Page 26, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A15.

2013-0321 Article Celebrating the Birth Day of Shri Mataji Nirmala Devi ‘Sahaja Yoga - A Silent Move Towards Transformation’, Free Press Journal, Page 3, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A16.

2018-1026 Article ‘Unite Nations through Meditation’, Free Press Journal, Page 26, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)

If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces). Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Archives Subteam sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Archive Post 4: First Annual Report
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Our subteam has started contributing to the Archives of the database via specific posts (so far 5 pdf files in 2 specific posts, on Divine Cool Breeze Magazine and on Letters and Press Releases) and via the table at the link Data Table, which currently has 1,280 rows and which is projected that in due time will have a number of rows between 4,000 and 21,000. About 150 total specific posts are envisioned and we will gradually reach there.

First Summary of the 14 numerical indices.
i. Rows of the Table: 1,280.
ii. Organized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,301.
iii. Estimated unorganized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,500.
iv. Specific posts: 2.
v. Estimated specific posts to be started: 148.
vi. Total links: 146.
vii. External Links: 141 (DCB: 141).
viii. CCT Links: 5.
ix. Total files uploaded: 5.
x. Total pages uploaded: 78.
xi. Other files (originals, received, etc.) uploaded: 0.
xii. Other pages uploaded: 0.
xiii. Files scanned and cropped by CCT: 5.
xiv. Pages scanned and cropped by CCT: 78.

We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, Our subteam has started contributing to the Archives of the database via specific posts (so far 5 pdf files in 2 specific posts, on Divine Cool Breeze Magazine and on Letters and Press Releases) and via the table at the link Data Table, which currently has 1,280 rows and which is projected that in due time will have a number of rows between 4,000 and 21,000. About 150 total specific posts are envisioned and we will gradually reach there. First Summary of the 14 numerical indices. i. Rows of the Table: 1,280. ii. Organized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,301. iii. Estimated unorganized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,500. iv. Specific posts: 2. v. Estimated specific posts to be started: 148. vi. Total links: 146. vii. External Links: 141 (DCB: 141). viii. CCT Links: 5. ix. Total files uploaded: 5. x. Total pages uploaded: 78. xi. Other files (originals, received, etc.) uploaded: 0. xii. Other pages uploaded: 0. xiii. Files scanned and cropped by CCT: 5. xiv. Pages scanned and cropped by CCT: 78. We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Archives Subteam

entry.title: Archive Post 3: Letters and Press Releases Scanned

link.title: Archive Post 3: Letters and Press Releases Scanned

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

This post will share letters and press releases scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

The Comprehensive Compilations Team

L1.

1903-0000 Horoscope Letter (Marathi), Page 2 (Mahipalsingh Jaisingh Raul Collection, scanned by Ankit Khare) (2 pages as jpgs, uploaded on 2023-0531)


L2.

1981-1222 Letter (Marathi) of Ramesh Modi to Raul Bāī (Mahipalsingh Jaisingh Raul Collection, scanned by Ankit Khare) (1 page from jpg, uploaded on 2023-0329)



L3.

1990-0424 Letter of Grégoire de Kalbermatten to President George Herbert Walker Bush of the U.S.A., Āśhram, 96 Shadow Lane New Rochelle, NY, U.S.A. (Yogi Mahajan Collection) (3 pages, uploaded on 2023-0119)


L4.

1990-1029 Letter of Dr. B. Khan from Kolkata to Rajiv Gandhi taken care of by Don Glover, New Delhi, India (Yogi Mahajan Collection) (2 pages, uploaded on 2023-0119)

PR1.

1988-0126 Press Release, Interview with Foreign Correspondents (29 Republic Day), On the Controversy of Dr. Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar and His Role in the Framing of the Indian Constitution, Pratiṣhṭhān, NDA Road, Warje, Pune, Maharashtra, India (Yogi Mahajan Collection) (2 pages, uploaded on 2023-0201)

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com The Comprehensive Compilations Team

entry.title: Archive Post 2: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

We are pleased to let you know that the Archives Subteam has started to share its scans, collections, and data. With the occasion of the upcoming Diwālī Celebrations, the subteam would like to offer to the Lotus Feet of our Divine Mother a new data archive table which will gradually grow to thousands of items.
Please kindly have a look at the link Table
The first estimate is between 4,000 and 21,000 items. Gradually, it will be developed more and more.
First priority will be given to new materials received or scanned.
We thank you in advance for any help, support, feedback, or contribution of files and data. Please kindly write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

The Archives Subteam of the Comprehensive Compilations Team
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, Jay Śhrī Mātājī! We are pleased to let you know that the Archives Subteam has started to share its scans, collections, and data. With the occasion of the upcoming Diwālī Celebrations, the subteam would like to offer to the Lotus Feet of our Divine Mother a new data archive table which will gradually grow to thousands of items. Please kindly have a look at the link Table The first estimate is between 4,000 and 21,000 items. Gradually, it will be developed more and more. First priority will be given to new materials received or scanned. We thank you in advance for any help, support, feedback, or contribution of files and data. Please kindly write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com The Archives Subteam of the Comprehensive Compilations Team

entry.title: Archive Post 1: CCT Scans of a few DCB (USA) Magazine issues

link.title: Archive Post 1: CCT Scans of a few DCB (USA) Magazine issues

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The website Divine Cool Breeze Books has generously shared as pdfs and/or ebooks and/or online's the old issues of Divine Cool Breeze (USA) Magazine and of its predecessors in the U.S.A. Our team has been asked to contribute with pdf scans of the few missing issues, which will be shared gradually below. Our team also hopes to contribute with a few better pdf scans versions than the currently available on the mentioned website or on other dedicated websites or sources.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters.

We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

The Comprehensive Compilations Team

I1. Divine Cool Breeze (USA), Volume 13, Issues 1 and 2 (28 pages, uploaded on 2022-0819)

Download the original CCT scan pdf here


I2. Divine Cool Breeze (USA), Volume 13, Issues 3 to 5 (40 pages, uploaded on 2022-0819)

Download the original CCT scan pdf here

The website Divine Cool Breeze Books has generously shared as pdfs and/or ebooks and/or online's the old issues of Divine Cool Breeze (USA) Magazine and of its predecessors in the U.S.A. Our team has been asked to contribute with pdf scans of the few missing issues, which will be shared gradually below. Our team also hopes to contribute with a few better pdf scans versions than the currently available on the mentioned website or on other dedicated websites or sources. Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com The Comprehensive Compilations Team
